attributes.action: change the law to make it illegal for NHS ambulances and paramedics to be used to convey or treat those citizens who need medical treatment after binge drinking.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These people can afford to pay for the drink to get into that state.  They can afford to pay the emergency ambulance and emergency medical costs which are the consequence.  The ambulance service and paramedics are paid for and trained by the taxpayer and should only be used when genuine non-self-contributory illnesses are diagnosed.
